solution_line_template: Since she buys one rug at ${buy_price_per_rug} and sells it at ${sell_price_per_rug}, she makes a profit of ${sell_price_per_rug}-${buy_price_per_rug} = $<<{sell_price_per_rug}-{buy_price_per_rug}={profit_per_rug}>>{profit_per_rug}
If she bought {num_rugs_bought} rugs at $40 and sold them at $60 each, she made a profit of {num_rugs_bought}*${profit_per_rug} = ${total_profit}
